text: Car 54, Where Are You? is an American sitcom that aired on NBC from September 1961 to April 1963 for 2 seasons and 60 episodes. It stars Fred Gwynne, Joe E. Ross, Hank Garrett, Martha Garrett, Bruce Kirby, Al Lewis, Charlotte Rae, Ossie Davis. It was made into a movie in 1994 and was a box office bomb. ==Other websites== * Category:1961 television series debuts Category:1963 television series endings Category:American sitcoms Category:1960s American television series Category:1960s American comedy television series Category:NBC network series Category:Television series set in New York (state) Category:English-language television programs
title: Car 54, Where Are You?
